	The Behavioral Economics of Retirement Savings Behavior, AARP Public Policy Institute White Paper	The Effects of Expenses on Mutual Fund Flows,	Number: 1210–NEW. Affected Public: Business or other forprofit. Estimated Number of Respondents: 16,000. Estimated Number of Annual Responses: 20,656,000. Frequency of Response: Initially, Annually, Upon Request, when a material change. Estimated Total Annual Burden Hours: 8,398,000 hours in the first year; 5,776,000 hours in each subsequent year. Estimated Total Annual Burden Cost: $642,541,000 for the first year; $493,242,000 for each subsequent year.
